caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. DENNIS JAMES SIGMAN, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Clark County, No. 79-1-00452-9, Thomas L. Lodge, J., entered February 15, 1980.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Pearson, J., concurred in by Reed, C.J., and Petrie, J.
